comment: Play says it is installed, but can't find the app or any evidence of it on the phone. No instructions & can't see any reviews, so nothing good I can say about it now. Android wear doesn't work either. Says it can't find the device (which is already paired and working fine).

reply.author: Frillroid Watch Faces
reply.content:
Hi walter,

Kindly follow the steps below, hope it will be helpful.

- Download the app "Android Wear" from play store
- Sync you smart watch to your device
- In android wear app, select the more option from the home screen
- Search for the watch face ""Teach Ops"
- Click send to wear

Hope you can use the watch face successfully.
